page.title: 12POPULATION-THE ELDERLY
page.content: There is a large proportion of people living in Minehead who are retired. Although many are local west country people who have retired near shops and the sea_front, many come here from towns and cities all over the country.There are different kinds of housing to meet different needs. Sheltered housing provides an independent life with the knowledge that there is a warden nearby able to assist in any emergancy. Nursing Home, of which there are six, cater for the very elderly, sick or even geriatric patients.Most of them have nursing staff. Some of the homes are supported financially by Churches or Charities and some rely solely on payments by the patients themselves or their relations.
